Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the head of Burisma has been "indicted" when no such announcement has been made.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or announcement of an indictment against the head of Burisma.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that an indictment has been made without providing any evidence or official announcement.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that no indictment has been announced by Ukrainian prosecutors.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by misrepresenting a separate press conference as an indictment announcement.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation bias in the claim.
